long_description: aluarc is the trademark of ozva construction that offers flexible spaces and outdoor living solutions internationally. aluarc systems are the fruit of the combination of 30 years of experience, glass system design expertise and the technical know-how of our company's european designers. at the same time, we produced our own patented products in a short time. with aluarc operable glass systems, we aim to create the best value for our dealers by producing perfectly working systems that do not have the design gaps of the existing brands in the sector. our systems are increasingly recognized internationally for their quality, ease of installation and aesthetics, as well as the design service and technical support we provide to our customers. a team composed of r&d experts, civil engineers and architects evaluates your project and offer the best solution according to your project needs. our dealers are able to draw, calculate and price their projects easily with the aluarc software. we give on site manufacturing and installation training for our products as well as online support to wherever you are.
